entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who is waving his crumpet impatiently and trying to calm down Harry. He says that they don't send people to Azkaban for blowing up their aunts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who has had past dealings with the Ministry of Magic and is being accused of using magic in his uncle's house.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a place where people are sent for punishment. Fudge mentions that they don't send people there just for blowing up their aunts.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is an organization that has given Harry official warnings in the past and threatened to expel him from Hogwarts if he uses magic again.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Harry is a student. The Ministry of Magic has threatened to expel him if he uses magic there again.

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is a person who Fudge goes to see about getting a room for Harry.

relationships.description: Fudge accuses Harry of using magic in his uncle's house.
The Ministry of Magic has given Harry official warnings and threatened to expel him from Hogwarts if he uses magic again.
Fudge goes to see Tom about getting a room for Harry.
